name: ReVeN -Wii U, PC, Mac, Linux, Ouya
blurb: Explore the beautiful and atmospheric planet: XR-Keres. Adapt to combat situations and uncover the mysteries of the great sacrifice.

rewards.reward: No Reward
THANK YOU!\r\n=============================== \r\nEvery dollar counts! Join in the discussion by pledging just a buck. Your name will appear in the credits of our game.
EARLY BIRD \r\n==============================\r\nOwn a DRM free digital copy of the game for less (in key or download form) This is a special early backer offer
GET THE GAME \r\n==============================\r\n Did you miss out on the EARLY BIRD reward? Its alright! Get a DRM free digital copy of the game (in key or download form)

GET THE GAME + BONUS KS GEAR SKIN \r\n=============================== \r\nGet a digital copy of the game (in key or download form for PC/Mac/Linux or Wii U) + Kickstarter Exclusive Character Skin for Multiplayer and Singleplayer

GET THE GAME + DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK
==============================
 DRM free digital copy of the game (in key or download form) + Digital copy of the Soundtrack composed by Mark McLemore +
Early access to Beta

2 GAME COPIES + EARLY BETA ACCESS + EXO GEAR SKIN\r\n==============================\r\n2 digital copies of the game (in key or download form) + Alternate Exo Gear Character Skin for Multiplayer expansion (Note: We have to reach the Multiplayer stretch goal for this character skin to be unlocked)+ Digital copy of the Soundtrack + Early access to Beta

DIGITAL ART BOOK + PDF GUIDE
==============================

All Previous Rewards + Digital Art book containing concepts from the game and additional lore +
PDF guide to the game

PHYSICAL GAME COPY AND MANUAL\r\n==============================\r\n This includes the physical box for the game, physical manual, digital copy of the Art Book, and Hi Res Wallpapers + 2 additional digital copies of the game (in key or download form)

NEXUM STATION EMPLOYEE\r\n==============================\r\nGet your name in the game as a Nexum Station Employee who left behind information for the player to discover in data logs + Physical copy of the game + Digital Art Book + Hi Res Wallpapers + 3 additional digital copies of the game (in key or download form)

TSHIRT\r\n==============================\r\nGet the ReVeN T-Shirt + Physical copy of the game + Digital Art Book + Hi Res Wallpapers + 3 additional digital copies of the game (in key or download form) + Gold Gear Character Skin + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies from other tiers)

GOLD EDITION =============================\r\nAn Exclusive Gold Edition Physical copy of the game featuring a SPECIAL GOLD METALLIC HOLOGRAPHIC PRINTED CASE COVER and game manual + Official ReVeN T-Shirt of your choice + 3 Digital Copies of the game + KS Gear + Digital OST + Aurelian Gear + Digital art book + PDF Guide

SIGNED PHYSICAL ART BOOK =============================\r\nGet the Physical art book that contains concepts and lore from the game and signed by the team + Physical copy of the game + 3 additional digital copies of the game (in key or download form) + Aurelian Gear Skin + KS Gear Skin + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)
REVEN HOODIE\r\n==============================\r\nGet the ReVeN Hoodie + 4 total copies of the game (1 physical) + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)

PHYSICAL ID BADGE + ACCESS TO CLASSIFIED INFO ON YOUR OWN CHARACTER FILE
==============================
 "Hello Dr. (Your real name)"
Get your NAME and hand drawn FACE on real ID Badge and in the game. Your character has left behind information for the player to discover. Your real life custom badge comes with it's own unique ID number that can access your personal computer terminal in the game + 4 total copies of the game (1 physical) + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)

BECOME A MINI BOSS\r\n==============================\r\nWe'll create a mini boss with your likeness that players will encounter in the game + 5 total copies of the game (1 physical) + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)

ONE OF A KIND ART PIECE ==============================\r\nReceive a one of a kind drawing of SyRek, our main character + 6 total copies of the game (1 physical) + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)

CREATE A BOSS\r\n==============================\r\nHelp create the look, behavior of a boss creature + Receive a grand total of 8 copies of the game (5 digital and 1 physical) + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)

CREATE AN ENVIRONMENT\r\n============================= Help us create an area that will be placed in the official game's release. We will provide you with the level creating tools and will work along side you to create a custom level that fits within our game's aesthetic style + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)

DEVELOPERS PARTY\r\n===============================\r\nCome celebrate the games release by joining us at the Launch party of ReVeN in Dallas Texas! Food, Drinks, and Games Galore! Accommodations and Travel not included + All previous rewards (Excluding limited rewards and additional game copies)
